videos.title: Introducing The Gralloch Ultra | 330km of Pure Scottish Gravel Adventure
videos.description:
The legend grows.

Introducing The Gralloch Ultra — a brand new 330km ultra-distance gravel challenge through the wild heart of Galloway, Scotland.
Created by the team behind The Gralloch, Scotland's iconic gravel event, this is a test of endurance, determination and adventure on some of Scotland’s most beautiful and remote trails.

Ride from coast to forest, moor to mountain, on a route that will push body and mind to their limits.
This is more than a ride — it’s an odyssey of grit, gravel and Galloway spirit.

📍 Gatehouse of Fleet, Scotland
📅 15–17 May 2026

🎟️ Find out more and enter at: www.grallochgravel.com/ultra

#TheGrallochUltra #GravelCycling #UltraDistance #Scotland #GravelAdventure

videos.title: Galloway Forest Gravel Epic
videos.description:
Fast becoming known for its epic gravel cycling the Galloway Forest Park is the largest Forest in the UK with endless miles of gravel and off road riding past stunning Lochs, rolling hills & stunning forest.
 
Offering brilliant views but without backbusting climbs the gravel here is rolling throughout and a great location to get miles under the belt and smiles in the saddle. One of the top 3 places for gravel riding in the UK and an absolute must ride for any off-roader.

https://gloriousgravel.com/product/gravel-sportives/galloway-forest-gravel-epic
